about_the_game:
Warchief is a brand new kind of Action real time strategy game. Choose your hero, recruit and customize your armies, explore the jungle, and seize strategic objectives to become the ultimate Warchief. Ready to dominate the battlefield?

CHOOSE YOUR HERO

Vorrash the Berserker
Destroy everything in your path with the powerful orc chief.
Don't let his axes rust.

Anukhara, the Forgotten
Poisons, slows, summons, and what else?
Perfect for the "control" player who loves to see their opponents rage.

Saar'kul, First of the Immortals
Skeletons, skeletons, always skeletons!
The necromancer will serve his future master with infinite... devotion.

Currently Available Heroes:
  • 3 unique heroes each with 2 passives, 2 spells (one regular and one ultimate), and the ability to carry 2 items.

SUMMON YOUR ARMY!

Dozens of creatures, sorcerers, orcs, mages, and dragons are at your disposal to defeat your enemies!
Each unit is unique and has passive and automatically activated skills.

  • Over 20 units and 10 spells available.
  • Units are categorized into melee, ranged, and flying, each with special abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.
  • Some units can be summoned only at tier 1, while others require tier 2.

Create the best possible composition and don't hesitate to modify it during the game if you want to surprise your opponent!

FARM THE JUNGLE AND COLLECT LEGENDARY ARTIFACTS

The more you farm, the more powerful your hero will become.
Plus, you'll collect unique artifacts assignable to your units!
Each item grants unique skills and boosts the stats of ALL your units.
Tired of games where theorycrafting is boring?
In Warchief, the possibilities are endless while being very accessible for new players.

CONTEST OBJECTIVES AND DOMINATE THE BATTLEFIELD!

Because a good game of strategy is nothing without objectives, you will choose which ones to contest or not.
The advantage is that there are plenty, each with different rewards.

  • 5 events on the map including 4 bosses, each offering significant rewards.
  • At night, the two strongest bosses roam in search of food; beware of encountering them too early!

Imagine chests appearing as if by magic, enemy gold mines ready to be pillaged, a giant Treant joining your cause, and mythical creatures capable of transforming your hero into an overpowered Warchief with lightning unleashed around him.
It's not just a game; it's a battlefield where madness and greatness intertwine to propel you to the top!

FINALLY, DEFEAT THE ELEMENTAL TITAN TO WIN!

Palisades, menacing towers, and at the heart of it all, an Elemental Titan.
Defeat this legendary entity and the victory will be yours.
Are you ready to face your destiny?

Will you be an excellent theorycrafter, recruit a massive army, and place your artifacts perfectly to crush your enemy?

Or will you be a backdoor player, luring your enemy to one spot while you destroy their towers?

You can also wait for the night and launch a surprise attack on their mines or base.
But beware of the monsters out at night!

And if you want to steamroll the game and transform your hero into the ultimate Warchief, you can also hunt one of the mythical creatures!

ADDITIONAL FEATURES


  • Modes: Play solo against AI or online against other players, including custom matches with friends.
  • Customization: Personalize your heroes with items found during matches, leveling up to improve all their spells.
  • Daily Challenges: Complete daily challenges to earn currency for unlocking additional units and spells.

Are you ready for the future of RTS? The battlefield awaits you!
